Reviews.Title: Amazing high speed video at a fraction of pro cost
Reviews.Author: Vin Biggs "Vin Biggs"
Reviews.Content: This  camera shoots amazing high speed video At  upto 1000 fps.  The still shots are high quality and offer bestshot mode,  shooting up to 100 stills instantly allowing you to choose the best

Reviews.Title: No written manuals
Reviews.Author: Curtis D. Foster
Reviews.Content: Casio is not providing a written (paper) manual.  They want you to take your computer into the field with you while learning all the bells and whistles.
